author: SeekAndFind
title: Pope Francis's Great Blunder
text:
One of the great tragedies of the Enlightenment and its aftermath was that Christianity in general and the Catholic Church in particular lost faith in their legitimacy and in the legitimacy of their mission. As a result, they surrendered that mission’s otherworldliness and agreed to fight only on temporal grounds. In other words, when the Church responded to its attackers, it did so not on its own terms but on the terms—and in the terms—of those attackers. Rather than focus on its mission and the eternal truths for which it had become the earthly vessel, the Church became distracted.
The problem wasn’t that the Church failed to defend itself, but that it did so on the foreign turf of the rationalist philosophers, economists, sociologists, and politicians. And it continues to do so.
Among the more pernicious consequences of this “blunder” is the occasional (but all too frequent) forays by Church leaders into the realm of temporal politics. Some outwardly “political” matters are, in reality, spiritual matters, matters of faith.
Abortion is one such issue. If one believes the words of the Book of Jeremiah, for example—“Before I formed you in the womb, I knew you. And before you were born, I consecrated you”—then one should also, as a matter of faith, believe that abortion is a heinous matter that takes the life of one of God’s beloved.
Such matters are, however, few and far between. Most of the time that the Church ventures into the political realm, it steps beyond the bounds of its authority; it compounds the blunder of fighting on the field of reason and human affairs and exacerbates its capitulation to the modern anti-revelation spirit.
When the Church engages in purely political matters and thereby departs from its mission, the effects are both manifold and potentially severe.
The first thing that the Church does when it plays politics is that it erodes its own authority. This is, in part, what Mann was getting at above. Moral absolutes cannot and should not be proved by worldly measures, and attempting to do so only makes the former look foolish by comparison to the latter.
Recently, Pope Francis sent a letter to the American bishops, more or less telling them that they must resist President Trump’s immigration policy. “I have followed closely the major crisis that is taking place in the United States with the initiation of a program of mass deportations,” the Pope wrote, and “the act of deporting people who in many cases have left their own land for reasons of extreme poverty, insecurity, exploitation, persecution or serious deterioration of the environment, damages the dignity of many men and women, and of entire families, and places them in a state of particular vulnerability and defenselessness.”>/B>
This is an exceptionally political statement. It takes an exceptionally ideological position. It is also exceptionally foolish and potentially exceptionally destructive. As R.R. Reno noted at First Things, the Pope’s stance is a “recipe for ecclesiastical suicide,” meaning it forces Americans to choose between loving their country and doing what the Pope insists is the only truly acceptable thing to do in this situation.
In short, the Pope is pitting the Church against the very idea of “America,” against the “shining city upon a hill” that has captured the spirit of freedom and the imagination of people worldwide for nearly a quarter of a millennium. The end result of this can only be that some people—many people, most people—will choose to ignore that which the Pope and his bishops insist is a moral necessity. That is a disastrous outcome and sets a disastrous precedent.
A second consequence of the Church’s involvement in politics is its distraction from its true mission. If the Church and its leaders are preoccupied with earthly matters, then it is quite probable that they will be diverted from their focus on spiritual matters, the matters of faith and morals that determine salvation.
Earlier this week, Pope Francis appointed Edward Weisenburger, the Bishop of Tucson, Arizona, to replace the retiring Allen Vigneron as the Archbishop of Detroit. Weisenburger—a favorite of the Pontiff’s—is a severe critic of President Trump’s, especially his immigration policies. Seven years ago, during the first Trump presidency, Weisenburger suggested that people who “are involved” in those policies should, perhaps, be subjected to “canonical penalties,” up to and including excommunication.
Needless to say, it is difficult for one to imagine how such actions would accomplish the mission of the Church to save souls. In advocating for the excommunication of political opponents, Weisenburger—soon to be an archbishop—both undermines the seriousness of the Church and confuses the faithful about their actual moral responsibilities.
Finally, by getting involved in politics, the Church risks tipping the political scales to one side or the other. It is clear that Pope Francis reviles Donald Trump’s immigration policies. It is also clear that he is frustrated and annoyed by Vice President Vance for not stating Catholic theology in exactly the same terms as he would. But does he necessarily prefer the partisan alternative?
Pope Francis should understand that American politics is, for all practical purposes, a binary calculation. He may think that he is simply stating what is right and just and encouraging all parties to accept his conclusions and practice his recommendation. In reality, however, he is picking sides. He may not intend to do so, but that is the practical effect of involving himself and the Church in American politics.
By attacking Trump and Vance on political matters, he is effectively encouraging American Catholics to embrace the alternative—the party that aggressively supports abortion and the sexualization of children, funds atheism and transgender ideology in foreign countries, and has no serious answer to the immigration problem, only platitudes and falsehoods.
Certainly, the Pope is free to disagree with Donald Trump’s immigration policies—or any of his policies, for that matter. But when he takes that objection and tries to make it the official position of the Church, to turn it into an inarguable matter of conscience, then he is overstepping his authority and, in the process, diminishing his genuine authority. That’s not merely a mistake; it’s also a shame. In this era, when the Church’s authority has already been eroded by the misdeeds of its clergy, adding to the distrust will only make its true mission that much harder.

author: Aubrey Spears
title: chevron-right
text: {p}{strong}CODE RED WEATHER overnight-Fri AM; Level 3 & Level 2 severe risk{ }{/strong}{/p}{p}Plan on CODE RED WEATHER overnight into early Friday morning. An Enhanced (level 3 out of 5) risk of severe weather now covers areas along and north of I-10. A Slight (level 2 out of 5) risk covers the rest of the NBC 15 neighborhood. Timing is tonight through Friday morning with several rounds of severe weather possible.{ } After midnight, some thunderstorms will be capable of unleashing damaging winds (potentially up to 80mph) along with golf ball sized hail. In fact some thunderstorms could congeal into a bow echo capable of a long swath of destructive winds.{ } { }A tornado cannot be ruled out.{ } It won't be a big rain producer as this front will be a fast-mover.{ }{/p}{p}Download the NBC 15 weather app. Go to the app store and type in WPMI WX. That way, if you're on the go and don't catch us on air or online, you can stay up to date right from your phone. Make sure you have multiple ways to receive watches and warnings. This weathermaker is forecast to march through at a vulnerable time, when many of us are sleeping. You want to have alerts that can wake you up.{/p}{p}Before the front arrives, southerly winds will gust up to 25mph, and max temps will soar near 90. Lows will be in the lower 70s.{/p}{p}In the wake of this weathermaker, temperatures will tumble to the upper 50s Saturday morning with lower 80s for highs both days this weekend. Right now, Mother's Day weekend looks rain-free.{/p}{p}The risk of rip currents at our local beaches will be HIGH Thursday and Friday then moderate for Saturday.{/p}{p}{strong}Meteorologist Kelly Foster{/strong}{/p}{p}NBC 15-area forecasts from the National Weather Service - {a href="https://www.weather.gov/mob/marine" target="_blank" title="https://www.weather.gov/mob/marine

author: , Oak Ridger
title: Watch as thousands gather at massive iftar table to break Ramadan fast
text: Video shows thousands gathering for mass iftar in Cairo's Matareya neighborhood The streets of Cairo's Matareya neighborhood were lined with hundreds of tables as thousands gathered to break their fast together on the 15th of Ramadan. The annual community meal has been growing ever since it began in 2012 and has been dubbed the longest iftar table in Egypt. The event has taken place every except for two years during the COVID-19 pandemic, [CBS News](https://www.cbsnews.com/news/egypt-cairo-biggest-iftar-ramadan-muslim-holy-month-in-matareya/?linkId=375865201&fbclid=IwAR30GuXfRu5gY58vG09SshxjEi-f8WqFjV0DMQe5rLliUqkrP1hh___GO9k_aem_AUIl_uI0m2Fa7d3yOvvul3lomGpKLS6JGHZtFmyh3G9V1ohArSC_wjk6LHqnroASeqR-a8yie8LuWMv_Tgdu1rN-) reported. There is no official count of how many people took part in the Matareya iftar, but organizers said as many as 30,000 people attended, [Egypt Today](https://www.egypttoday.com/Article/1/131260/Matariyah-iftar-banquet-manifests-ingenuity-of-Egyptian-people-PM-Madbouli) reported. This year's event featured around 700 tables that stretched for more than half a mile across seven alleyways, [Gulf News](https://gulfnews.com/world/mena/egypt-10000-feast-at-cairos-matariya-mega-iftar-on-10th-anniversary-1.101903343) reported. Footage of the event showed packed streets lit with brightly colored Ramadan decorations lining the alleyways of the neighborhood in the eastern part of Cairo. When is Ramadan 2024?: [What is it? Muslims set to mark a month of spirituality, reflection](https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2024/03/08/ramadan-2024-when-what/72866014007/) Began with just a few neighbors At its start, the event was just a handful of neighbors breaking their fast together. Hamada Hassan told CBS News that no one had enough space in their home to host everyone, so they set up tables outside. It only continued to grow from there. Gulf News reported organizers begin preparing for the event around two months in advance every year. Preparations include everything from gathering necessary supplies to feed a whole neighborhood, to cleaning and decorating the streets, CBS News reported. Ahmed Ekram, an organizer said this year 10,000 meals were served, Gulf News reported, citing local media. Some in attendance didn't eat, but went to simply enjoy the camaraderie, CBS News reported. Local donations fund the costs of the event, which over the years has seen politicians, celebrities, and diplomats in attendance. “We do not care about the cost, as all the residents of the neighborhood participate in financing the table in order to bring joy and happiness to the people of the region and other neighboring areas," Ahmed Khalaf, one of the organizers of the 2023 event told [Arab News](https://www.arabnews.com/node/2284791/middle-east) at the time.

author: Puntomagazine.it
title: Lavoro Auriemma | Vertenza montefibre calvario lungo 20 anni chiesto tavolo al ministero
text: Vertenza montefibre di Acerra: la deputata Carmela Auriemma chiede un tavolo al ministero per trovare soluzioni per i 230 lavoratori in difficoltàROMA, 28 NOVEMBRE 2024 – “Dopo anni, la Vertenza montefibre di Acerra resta ancora irrisolta. Nel mio Question time di stamani in commissione Lavoro alla Camera ho chiesto al sottosegretario Durigon di aprire un tavolo al ministero di via Veneto per trovare una soluzione per 230 lavoratori che da vent’anni vivono in condizione di povertà. Dal 2004 al 2015, essi sono stati in cassa integrazione (ordinaria e straordinaria) e dal 2015 a oggi si sostengono grazie alla mobilità, prima ordinaria poi in deroga. Nel frattempo, questi lavoratori sono andati avanti con l’età, che ha reso sempre più difficile la loro ricollocazione: per loro, il riconoscimento dei contributi figurativi per l’esposizione all’amianto potrebbe rappresentare una soluzione.Leggi su Puntomagazine.it Puntomagazine.it - Lavoro, Auriemma: Vertenza montefibre calvario lungo 20 anni, chiesto tavolo al ministero - LAVORO, AURIEMMA (M5S), VERTENZA MONTEFIBRE CALVARIO LUNGO 20 ANNI, CHIESTO TAVOLO AL MINISTERO - Ex Montefibre di Acerra, un calvario lungo 18 anni "La Porta del Mediterraneo", ’incoming tour attraverso le bellezze reggine reggiotoday.it E45, lavori di pavimentazione: prevista l'uscita obbligatoria allo svincolo di Verghereto cesenatoday.it Fifa The Best: Maignan per il miglior portiere e Dimarco per il Puskas Award cesenatoday.it Gennaro Sangiuliano ad Arezzo per presentare il libro su Trump arezzonotizie.it Calciomercato Milan, il vice Theo Hernandez arriva dall’Empoli. Il profilo arezzonotizie.it Quotidiani sportivi, le prime pagine: Inter, poi Koopmeiners e Motta arezzonotizie.it A Chieti il seminario del procuratore militare di Roma sulle attività di polizia giudiziaria nel comparto ... chietitoday.it Video Lavoro Auriemma

author: Breogán_VK
title: #31 Belén "blasfemo" con personas del mismo sexo indigna a los conservadores italianos
text:
[gelatti](/user/gelatti)a [es.investing.com](/go/link/3890231)
Puedo entender que les moleste por "romper la tradición" a mi también me molesta cuando le quitan la barba a un personaje de comic que la lleva.
Ahora, que les moleste porque sea del mismo sexo,,, recordemos que a esta mujer le preño una paloma y vamos a tirarnos ahora de los pelos porque esté con una mujer?
[#4](c4#c-4) Eso explicaría de forma que todo el mundo pueda entender como María llegó virgen a su cita con la paloma pese a estar casada.
[#4](c4#c-4) mira que podía haber optado por convertir a los reyes en gays, o hacer una carroza del orgullo con los pastorcillos, pero poner dos vírgenes María es un sinsentido. Respeta lo básico del Belén y a partir de ahí añade lo que quieras, no te pases tomando licencias que luego queda irreconocible.
[#18](c18#c-18) pues está dentro de la tradición. Si en el belén había un buey, ¿por qué no unas boyeras?
Dicho con todo el respeto hacia las lesbianas y el resto de personas que solo quieren ejercer su libertad sexual sin que venga ningún cura a meter el hocico.
[#2](c2#c-2) Ojalá algún día se pueda extraer energía de la subnormalidad y la estupidez. Conquistariamos el universo.
[#24](c24#c-24) pero es que quizás no es cuestión de comprensión lectora, si no de capacidad redactora.
O quizás será bueno que en vez de dar una vuelta a las cosas dijeras claramente lo que quieres decír.
A mi que vengas con rodeos sobre que si el islam se debe enseñar por que la otra se enseña, pero eh, que a mi no me gusta... Me dice que no sabes ni lo que hablas.
A mi me la pela. Esta bien lo de defender la libertad de expresión y la libertad para creer o no creer.
Tus creencias para ti y yo en un país libre haré lo que quiera.
Pero luego vemos la otra cara de la moneda.
Que si una diputada de podemos dice que el islam es el feminismo e invento la seguridad social.
https://www.google.com/amp/s/amp.antena3.com/noticias/espana/polemicas-declaraciones-nora-banos-candidata-podemos-islam-feminista-invento-seguridad-social_202002245e53d5a00cf2a8ef178bab57.html
Público, el periódico que izquierdas llamando la atención por que no se enseña suficiente islam en las escuelas.
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.publico.es/sociedad/asignatura-religion-islamica-colegios-espana-alumnos-musulmanes.html/amp
Se puede reivindicar con el belen, pero hay que retirar cerdo para no ofender a los musulmanes.
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.elespanol.com/espana/20230626/cup-exige-retirar-alimentos-cerdo-fiestas-cataluna-respeto-musulmanes/774422768_0.amp.html
Muy buena esta libertad.
[#12](c12#c-12) Lo que tú no entiendes es que si metes en el juego las creencias de unos no puedes sacar las de otros. Y para que no se ofendan los capillitas somos capaces de comer por todos lados. Yo estoy COMPLETAMENTE EN CONTRA de que haya CUALQUIER religión en educación, sanidad o en el ejercicio, pero por otro lado, entiendo que si esta presente una, los demás pidan lo propio.
Se nos olvida que la iglesia se lleva un buen pico por dar "ese servicio" no solo en colegios
[#17](c17#c-17) tu comentario esta mal desarrollado y carece de sentido.
Estas "COMPLETAMENTE EN CONTRA de que haya CUALQUIER religión en educación, sanidad o en el ejército " pero por otro lado "entiendo que si esta presente una, los demás pidan lo propio."
No ves falta de lógica en tu argumento? Estas en contra y al mismo tiempo a favor.
[#19](c19#c-19) No, estoy encontra de que paguemos el profe de religión en los coles, el mantenimiento de capilla en universidades, hospitales y cuarteles (con su correspondiente cura). Y hablamos de religión catolica.
Ahora bien, ENTIENDO, que si hay prevendas para unos, los otros (llamese musulmanes, testigos de Jehova o san pitopato), estén en su derecho de recibir las mismas.
No tienes ningún tipo de comprensión lectora.
[#20](c20#c-20) ahora ya te voy entendiendo mejor.
Básicamente, ahora lo que me dices es que no al catolicismo, pero como esta el catolicismo, entonces las demás también.
Podrías haber dicho, quitemos el catolicismo y no dejemos pasar el resto de religiones, pero.... Si hay una todas las demás también. Y sin embargo dices que estás en contra.
Lo lógico sería decir que estás en contra del catolicismo y a favor de toda las demás.
Que no se enteren los de vox que en el Belén de Vilavenut también hay dos madres haciendo de Maria y José.
https://www.ccma.cat/324/el-pessebre-vivent-de-vilavenut-enguany-amb-dues-mares-de-deu-i-sense-sant-josep/noticia/3268061/

author: MH
title: Presunto extorsionador estalló en pedazos intentando detonar un explosivo en Ecuador
text: Una terrible forma de morir halló un presunto delincuente luego de que un explosivo que intentaba detonar en un negocio en la ciudad de Guayaquil, Ecuador, estallara en sus manos, matándolo de forma inmediata. El hecho fue registrado por cámaras de seguridad. Por: [Perú21](https://peru21.pe/mundo/america/ecuador-presunto-extorsionador-estalla-en-pedazos-tras-intentar-detonar-explosivo-en-un-negocio-ecuador-extorsionador-extorsion-guayaquil-mundo-explosivo-video-noticia/) Ocurrió en la avenida Francisco de Orellana, donde minutos antes de las 11:00 pm, el presunto delincuente desciende de un autor rojo y se coloca al lado de un local comercial, donde intenta arrojar un explosivo. El joven procede a encender lo que aparenta ser dinamita, pero este estalló en sus manos, matándolo inmediatamente, mientras que su compinche en el auto rojo emprende la huida. Todo el hecho fue captado por una cámara de seguridad, que registró la terrible muerte del presunto delincuente. Según el medio local El Telégrafo, el explosivo utilizado sería una dinamita destinada a la minería, lo que explicaría su poder detonante. ? [#AHORA]: Se difunde video donde supuesto vacunador intentaba colocar una bomba en alguna vivienda o local comercial y EXPLOTA dejándolo sin vida. Esto por la Av. Francisco de Orellana, a pocos metros del Riocentro Norte, en [#Guayaquil]. El sonido de la explosión se escuchó en… [https://t.co/d8fYrxPd9a] [pic.twitter.com/NyXwiNvPAl] — ?? CUPSFIRE (@Cupsfire_gye) [December 28, 2023] Para leer más, pulse [aquí. ](https://peru21.pe/mundo/america/ecuador-presunto-extorsionador-estalla-en-pedazos-tras-intentar-detonar-explosivo-en-un-negocio-ecuador-extorsionador-extorsion-guayaquil-mundo-explosivo-video-noticia/)
